name: Course on Physics for INPHO Foundation and JEE Advance 2023 (LOM)
description: In this course, Nitin Sachan will provide in-depth knowledge of Physics. The course will be helpful for aspirants preparing for Olympiads (NSEP, INPHO) and JEE Advance 2023. Learners at any stage of their preparation will be benefited from the course. All doubts related to the topic will be clarified during the doubt clearing sessions in the course. Class dates and timings along with topic details are given below. The course will be covered in Hindi and the notes will be provided in English.

value.title: Friction and Rigid Body Constraints: Problem Solving
Law of Motion: Uniform Motion and Uniform Chain
Constraints: String Constraints and Virtual Work Method
Wedge Constraint Motion and Velocity of a Point on String
Pseudo Force and Its Applications - I
Uniform Chain: Constraints in Motor Problems
Kinetic Friction and Static Friction: Problem Solving
Friction and General Methods for Friction: Problem Solving
Cumulative Problems and Doubt Clearing Session
